theorem.name: belBT_base_clause

text.english: Base clause of definition of \(\texttt{belBT}\):\[ \forall b \in A .\; \texttt{belBT}(\lambda, b) = \texttt{false} \]
text.italiano: Clausola base della definizione di \(\texttt{belBT}\):\[ \forall b \in A .\; \texttt{belBT}(\lambda, b) = \texttt{false} \]

theorem.coq:
Theorem belBT_base_clause : forall (b : A), belBT lmd b = false.
Proof.
reflexivity.
Qed.
